items.comment: Night only.
Verify all caution/warning lights illuminate.

items.text: FIRE DETECT BLEED AIR LEAK TEST
items.comment: Verify fire T-handles and BLEED AIR LEAK alert illuminate.
Totalizer should be 6000 pounds with main tanks full.
APU EGT should stabilize at 400°C - 450°C with APU RPM at 100%. EGT will spike at 760°C.
Continue checklist while EGI BIT and alignment completes.
Pull HM, IM, FM, VHF, UHF switches. Set volume as desired.
Do not start aircraft engines until cleared by ATC.
Move throttle out of OFF detent.
L core RPM should stabilize at 56% with ITT between 275°C and 865°C. ITT will spike at 900°C.
HYD SYS L pressure should stabilize between 2800 PSI and 3350 PSI.
Move throttle out of OFF detent.
R core RPM should stabilize at 56% with ITT between 275°C and 865°C. ITT will spike at 900°C.
HYD SYS R pressure should stabilize between 2800 and 3350 PSI.
Monitor L HYD SYS hydraulic pressure.
Monitor R HYD SYS hydraulic pressure.
Test disconnect with control stick paddle switch, then re-engage.
Verify TAKEOFF TRIM light illuminates.
Continue checklist while IFFCC BIT completes.
Set to DAY or NIGHT per pilot preference.
Continue checklist while MFCDs power on.
Wait for data load to complete.
Verify flight member symbols visible on TAD.
Verify all systems operational.
Verify data upload completed. Configure weapon systems as desired.
After BIT is complete, set CCIP Consent, AAS, 30 MM, and display modes as desired.
Set when SYS / INS / ALIGN page indicates alignment complete (T = 4.0 0.8).
Configure CMSP programs per mission briefing.
Verify flap position MVR (7°) with gauge on Landing Gear Control Panel.
Set to TAXI at night.
Do not taxi aircraft until cleared by ATC.
Core RPM should not exceed 70%.
Verify toe brakes operational when aircraft starts moving.

items.text: Taxi speed between 15 KTS and 25 KTS. Use rudder pedals to steer aircraft on ground.
To stop, set throttles to IDLE and apply toe brakes.

items.comment: Set to LAND at night.
Do not enter runway until cleared by ATC.

items.text: Line up on runway centerline after receiving clearance from ATC.

items.comment: Ensure normal readings.
Ensure no caution lights active.
Deactivate NWS when airspeed passes 70 KTS.

items.text: Rotate to 10° pitch approximately 10 KTS before takeoff speed. Takeoff speed is approximately 135 KTS with combat load.
Complete fence in checklist prior to entering combat area.

items.comment: Set to GUNARM if PAC not desired.
AGM-65 electro-optical alignment takes approximately 3 minutes.

items.subtitle: N/A
items.comment: Assess aircraft control, damage, and fuel quantity.
Set to TAXI at night.

items.text: Engines must be set to IDLE for 5 minutes before proceeding.
items.comment: Taxi time may be included if core RPM was < 80%.
Hold switch in MOTOR position for at least 30 seconds.
Verify all landing gear indicators illuminate.

items.text: Check L HYD SYS hydraulic pressure. If pressure is normal:

items.comment: Roll aircraft rapidly to attempt to shake gear loose.

items.text: If APU fire T-handle light does not extinguish:
If both presses of discharge switch fail to extinguish fire, land as soon as possible.

If possible, eject above:
• 2000 FT AGL in level flight
• 4000 FT AGL in uncontrolled flight
Turn aircraft towards uninhabited area. Trim to lowest practical speed. Hold wings level.
Reduce power to affected engine. If engine fire T-handle light does not extinguish:
If both presses of discharge switch fail to extinguish fire, land as soon as possible.
